content.rendered:
On 3rd November 2015, students from the STeP Center CERA(Centre for Rural Action) went for the exposure visit to Bhagya Printers at Madambakkam in Chennai.

Total of 40 students along with 4 teachers were present for the visit. Mrs. Brahmi, Senior manager interacted with the students. She explained how to design visiting cards, invitation card, banners and pamphlets etc. She also briefed about what is the use of photoshop, Coral Draw. While visiting the whole store, students observed the whole process of printing.

At the end of the day, students asked several queries related to printing which was promptly answered by the senior manager. At the end of the visit the students were very happy and motivated.
